quiz.question: _____ disparagingly
quiz.explanation: 轻蔑地，轻蔑地说话。The aristocrat would speak disparagingly about anyone who didn't meet his standards. 这位贵族会轻蔑地谈论任何不符合他标准的人。

quiz.question: ___ grudgingly
quiz.explanation: 勉强地，勉强地点头。After losing the debate, he would nod grudgingly in acknowledgment of his opponent's points. 辩论失败后，他勉强地点头承认对手的观点。

quiz.question: _____ obligingly
quiz.explanation: 乐于助人地，乐于助人地微笑。The hotel receptionist would smile obligingly at every guest request, no matter how unusual. 酒店接待员会乐于助人地对每一个客人的要求微笑，无论多么不寻常。

quiz.question: ___ unblushingly
quiz.explanation: 毫不脸红地，毫不脸红地说。He would say unblushingly that he was the best candidate, despite his lack of experience. 尽管缺乏经验，他会毫不脸红地说自己是最佳候选人。

quiz.question: _________ scathingly
quiz.explanation: 尖刻地，尖刻地批评。The film critic would criticize scathingly any movie that lacked originality. 这位电影评论家会尖刻地批评任何缺乏原创性的电影。

quiz.question: ___ soothingly
quiz.explanation: 安抚地，安抚地说。The nurse would say soothingly to the frightened child that everything would be alright. 护士会安抚地对惊恐的孩子说一切都会好起来的。

quiz.question: _____ willingly
quiz.explanation: 心甘情愿地，心甘情愿地同意。She would agree willingly to help her neighbor whenever needed. 她会心甘情愿地同意在需要时帮助邻居。

quiz.question: ___ cajolingly
quiz.explanation: 哄骗地，哄骗地问。The child would ask cajolingly for just one more cookie before bedtime. 孩子会哄骗地要求睡前再吃一块饼干。

quiz.question: startlingly _____
quiz.explanation: 惊人地，惊人地清晰。The mountain lake was startlingly clear, revealing every pebble on the bottom. 山中的湖水惊人地清澈，可以看到湖底的每一颗鹅卵石。

quiz.question: dazzlingly ______
quiz.explanation: 耀眼地，耀眼地明亮。The diamond necklace was dazzlingly bright under the spotlight. 钻石项链在聚光灯下耀眼地明亮。

quiz.question: ____ wonderingly
quiz.explanation: 惊奇地，惊奇地看。The child would look wonderingly at the magician's tricks. 孩子会惊奇地看着魔术师的戏法。

quiz.question: _____ witheringly
quiz.explanation: 尖刻地，尖刻地回答。She would reply witheringly to any suggestion she found foolish. 她会尖刻地回答任何她认为愚蠢的建议。

quiz.question: ___ despairingly
quiz.explanation: 绝望地，绝望地哭泣。The lost hiker would sob despairingly when rescue seemed impossible. 当救援似乎不可能时，迷路的徒步旅行者会绝望地哭泣。

quiz.question: ____ enquiringly
quiz.explanation: 疑问地，疑问地看。The dog would look enquiringly at its owner, waiting for permission to eat. 狗会疑问地看着主人，等待进食的许可。

quiz.question: ___ inquiringly
quiz.explanation: 疑问地，疑问地问。He would ask inquiringly about the strange noise coming from the basement. 他会疑问地询问地下室传来的奇怪声音。

quiz.question: _____ accusingly
quiz.explanation: 指责地，指责地盯着。She would stare accusingly at her brother, knowing he had eaten her cake. 她会指责地盯着弟弟，知道是他吃了她的蛋糕。

quiz.question: _____ musingly
quiz.explanation: 沉思地，沉思地微笑。The old professor would smile musingly while recalling his university days. 老教授回忆大学时光时会沉思地微笑。

quiz.question: _____ placatingly
quiz.explanation: 安抚地，安抚地说话。The manager would speak placatingly to the angry customer. 经理会安抚地对愤怒的顾客说话。

quiz.question: ____ gloatingly
quiz.explanation: 幸灾乐祸地，幸灾乐祸地咧嘴笑。The villain would grin gloatingly at his enemy's misfortune. 恶棍会幸灾乐祸地对敌人的不幸咧嘴笑。

quiz.question: ______ bitingly
quiz.explanation: 尖刻地，尖刻地回答。She would answer bitingly when questioned about her failure. 当被问及失败时，她会尖刻地回答。

quiz.question: ______ tauntingly
quiz.explanation: 嘲弄地，嘲弄地反驳。The bully would retort tauntingly to any challenge from weaker students. 恶霸会嘲弄地反驳来自较弱学生的任何挑战。

quiz.question: ___ disconcertingly
quiz.explanation: 令人不安地，令人不安地说。He would say disconcertingly calm things during moments of crisis. 在危机时刻，他会令人不安地说些平静的话。

quiz.question: ____ sportingly
quiz.explanation: 有运动精神地，有运动精神地比赛。The team would play sportingly even when losing badly. 即使输得很惨，球队也会有运动精神地比赛。

quiz.question: ___ unwittingly
quiz.explanation: 无意中，无意中说。She would say unwittingly reveal secrets while chatting casually. 她会在随意聊天时无意中透露秘密。

quiz.question: ______ cuttingly
quiz.explanation: 刻薄地，刻薄地评论。The critic would remark cuttingly on the actor's poor performance. 评论家会刻薄地评论演员糟糕的表演。

quiz.question: ____ reprovingly
quiz.explanation: 责备地，责备地看。The teacher would look reprovingly at students who arrived late. 老师会责备地看着迟到的学生。

quiz.question: ____ pityingly
quiz.explanation: 怜悯地，怜悯地看。She would look pityingly at the homeless man on the corner. 她会怜悯地看着街角的流浪汉。

quiz.question: _____ smugly
quiz.explanation: 自鸣得意地，自鸣得意地微笑。He would smile smugly after winning the competition. 赢得比赛后，他会自鸣得意地微笑。

quiz.question: ___ rashly
quiz.explanation: 鲁莽地，鲁莽地行动。The young knight would act rashly without considering the consequences. 年轻的骑士会鲁莽地行动而不考虑后果。

quiz.question: ______ mulishly
quiz.explanation: 固执地，固执地拒绝。The stubborn child would refuse mulishly to eat vegetables. 固执的孩子会固执地拒绝吃蔬菜。

quiz.question: _____ owlishly
quiz.explanation: 像猫头鹰一样地，像猫头鹰一样地眨眼。The professor would blink owlishly through his thick glasses. 教授会透过厚厚的眼镜像猫头鹰一样地眨眼。

quiz.question: ______ snappishly
quiz.explanation: 暴躁地，暴躁地回答。When tired, she would answer snappishly to simple questions. 累了的时候，她会暴躁地回答简单的问题。

quiz.question: ____ feverishly
quiz.explanation: 狂热地，狂热地工作。The students would work feverishly to finish the project before the deadline. 学生们会狂热地工作以在截止日期前完成项目。

quiz.question: __ unearthly ____
quiz.explanation: 可怕的，一声可怕的嚎叫。An unearthly howl echoed through the abandoned mansion at midnight. 午夜时分，一声可怕的嚎叫在废弃的豪宅中回荡。

quiz.question: _____ moodily
quiz.explanation: 情绪低落地，情绪低落地说话。The teenager would speak moodily when asked about school. 当被问及学校时，这个青少年会情绪低落地说话。

quiz.question: _____ cagily
quiz.explanation: 谨慎地，谨慎地回答。The suspect would reply cagily to the detective's questions. 嫌疑人会谨慎地回答侦探的问题。

quiz.question: ____ creakily
quiz.explanation: 吱吱作响地，吱吱作响地走。The elderly man would walk creakily down the stairs each morning. 老人每天早上都会吱吱作响地走下楼梯。

quiz.question: ____ cheekily
quiz.explanation: 厚脸皮地，厚脸皮地咧嘴笑。The mischievous boy would grin cheekily after playing a prank. 淘气的男孩恶作剧后会厚脸皮地咧嘴笑。

quiz.question: sulkily ______
quiz.explanation: 闷闷不乐地，闷闷不乐地拒绝。The child would sulkily refuse to apologize for breaking the vase. 孩子会闷闷不乐地拒绝为打破花瓶道歉。

quiz.question: ____ jerkily
quiz.explanation: 突然地，突然地移动。The old robot would move jerkily across the factory floor. 旧机器人会在工厂地板上突然地移动。

quiz.question: _____ huskily
quiz.explanation: 沙哑地，沙哑地说话。After shouting at the concert, she would speak huskily the next day. 在音乐会上大喊大叫后，第二天她会沙哑地说话。

quiz.question: ____ gloomily
quiz.explanation: 忧郁地，忧郁地叹气。He would sigh gloomily while looking at the rainy weather. 他会忧郁地叹气，看着雨天。

quiz.question: ____ doily
quiz.explanation: 蕾丝，蕾丝桌垫。A delicate lace doily adorned the antique coffee table. 一块精致的蕾丝桌垫装饰着古董咖啡桌。

quiz.question: ________ grumpily
quiz.explanation: 脾气暴躁地，脾气暴躁地抱怨。The old man would complain grumpily about the noise from neighbors. 老人会脾气暴躁地抱怨邻居的噪音。

quiz.question: ____ wearily
quiz.explanation: 疲倦地，疲倦地打哈欠。After working all night, she would yawn wearily during the meeting. 工作了一整夜后，她会在会议期间疲倦地打哈欠。

quiz.question: _____ warily
quiz.explanation: 警惕地，警惕地观察。The cat would watch warily as the dog approached. 当狗靠近时，猫会警惕地观察。

quiz.question: _____ cheerily
quiz.explanation: 兴高采烈地，兴高采烈地微笑。She would smile cheerily at everyone she met on the street. 她会对在街上遇到的每个人兴高采烈地微笑。

quiz.question: ____ airily
quiz.explanation: 轻快地，轻快地挥手。He would wave airily at his concerns, dismissing them casually. 他会轻快地挥手表示不在意，随意地忽视这些担忧。

quiz.question: ____ clumsily
quiz.explanation: 笨拙地，笨拙地走。The puppy would walk clumsily on the slippery floor. 小狗会在光滑的地板上笨拙地走。

quiz.question: _____ fussily
quiz.explanation: 挑剔地，挑剔地打扮。She would dress fussily for every occasion, never satisfied with her appearance. 她会为每个场合挑剔地打扮，从不满意自己的外表。

quiz.question: ____ shiftily
quiz.explanation: 躲闪地，躲闪地看。The thief would look shiftily around before stealing the wallet. 小偷在偷钱包前会躲闪地四处张望。

quiz.question: _____ loftily
quiz.explanation: 高傲地，高傲地说话。The aristocrat would speak loftily to those of lower social standing. 贵族会对社会地位较低的人高傲地说话。

quiz.question: ____ mightily
quiz.explanation: 用力地，用力地推。The workers would push mightily against the heavy door. 工人们会用力地推着沉重的门。

quiz.question: ______ haughtily
quiz.explanation: 傲慢地，傲慢地回答。The queen would answer haughtily to anyone who questioned her authority. 女王会对任何质疑她权威的人傲慢地回答。

quiz.question: ______ jauntily
quiz.explanation: 活泼地，活泼地大步走。He would stride jauntily down the street, whistling a happy tune. 他会活泼地沿着街道大步走，吹着欢快的曲调。

quiz.question: _____ hastily
quiz.explanation: 匆忙地，匆忙地离开。She would leave hastily when she realized she was late for the appointment. 当她意识到约会迟到时，她会匆忙地离开。

quiz.question: _____ nastily
quiz.explanation: 恶毒地，恶毒地回答。The mean girl would reply nastily to anyone who tried to befriend her. 刻薄的女孩会对任何试图与她交朋友的人恶毒地回答。

quiz.question: ___ testily
quiz.explanation: 不耐烦地，不耐烦地说。The tired teacher would say testily that he had already explained it three times. 疲惫的老师会不耐烦地说他已经解释了三遍。

quiz.question: ___ hazily
quiz.explanation: 模糊地，模糊地看见。After hitting his head, he would see hazily for several minutes. 撞到头后，他会模糊地看东西好几分钟。

quiz.question: _______ wheezily
quiz.explanation: 喘息地，喘息地呼吸。The old man with asthma would breathe wheezily after climbing stairs. 患有哮喘的老人爬楼梯后会喘息地呼吸。

quiz.question: _____ breezily
quiz.explanation: 轻松自如地，轻松自如地微笑。She would smile breezily despite the stressful situation. 尽管情况紧张，她还是会轻松自如地微笑。

quiz.question: ____ bleakly
quiz.explanation: 凄凉地，凄凉地看。He would look bleakly at the barren landscape before him. 他会凄凉地看着眼前荒芜的景色。

quiz.question: _____ prickly
quiz.explanation: 易怒地，易怒地说话。When hungry, he would speak prickly to anyone who bothered him. 饿的时候，他会对任何打扰他的人易怒地说话。

quiz.question: _____ sleekly
quiz.explanation: 光滑地，光滑地发光。The polished car would shine sleekly in the showroom. 抛光的汽车在展厅里会光滑地发光。

quiz.question: _____ meekly
quiz.explanation: 温顺地，温顺地同意。The timid student would agree meekly to whatever the teacher suggested. 胆小的学生会温顺地同意老师建议的任何事情。

quiz.question: _____ blankly
quiz.explanation: 茫然地，茫然地盯着。She would stare blankly at the complex math problem. 她会茫然地盯着复杂的数学题。

quiz.question: sparkly ____
quiz.explanation: 闪亮的，闪亮的眼睛。The little girl had sparkly eyes filled with excitement on Christmas morning. 小女孩在圣诞节早晨有着充满兴奋的闪亮的眼睛。

quiz.question: ____ briskly
quiz.explanation: 轻快地，轻快地走。She would walk briskly to stay warm in the cold weather. 她会轻快地走以在寒冷的天气中保持温暖。

quiz.question: _____ sardonically
quiz.explanation: 讽刺地，讽刺地微笑。He would smile sardonically at his rival's failed attempt. 他会对对手失败的尝试讽刺地微笑。

quiz.question: _____ emphatically
quiz.explanation: 强调地，强调地陈述。The lawyer would state emphatically that his client was innocent. 律师会强调地陈述他的当事人是无辜的。

quiz.question: _____ ecstatically
quiz.explanation: 狂喜地，狂喜地欢呼。The fans would cheer ecstatically when their team scored. 当他们的球队得分时，球迷们会狂喜地欢呼。

quiz.question: _______ magnetically
quiz.explanation: 有磁性地，有磁性地吸引。The charismatic speaker would attract magnetically a large audience. 这位有魅力的演讲者会有磁性地吸引大量观众。

quiz.question: uncharacteristically ____
quiz.explanation: 不合常规地，不合常规地迟到。The punctual student arrived uncharacteristically late to class. 守时的学生不合常规地迟到了。

quiz.question: ____ quizzically
quiz.explanation: 疑惑地，疑惑地看。The confused dog would look quizzically at the strange object. 困惑的狗会疑惑地看着那个奇怪的物体。

quiz.question: _____ regally
quiz.explanation: 华丽地，华丽地打扮。The queen would dress regally for the coronation ceremony. 女王会为加冕典礼华丽地打扮。

quiz.question: _____ cordially
quiz.explanation: 热情地，热情地问候。The host would greet cordially every guest at the party. 主人会热情地问候派对上的每一位客人。

quiz.question: _____ genially
quiz.explanation: 亲切地，亲切地微笑。The grandfather would smile genially at his grandchildren. 祖父会对他的孙子们亲切地微笑。

quiz.question: ___ magisterially
quiz.explanation: 威严地，威严地说。The judge would say magisterially that order must be maintained in the court. 法官会威严地说法庭必须保持秩序。

quiz.question: _____ confidentially
quiz.explanation: 秘密地，秘密地说话。She would speak confidentially about her friend's personal problems. 她会秘密地谈论朋友的个人问题。

quiz.question: ___ deferentially
quiz.explanation: 恭敬地，恭敬地鞠躬。The servant would bow deferentially to the master. 仆人会对主人恭敬地鞠躬。

quiz.question: _____ jovially
quiz.explanation: 愉快地，愉快地笑。Santa Claus would laugh jovially at the children's excitement. 圣诞老人会对孩子们的兴奋愉快地笑。

quiz.question: ______ abnormally
quiz.explanation: 异常地，异常地行为。The usually calm dog would behave abnormally during thunderstorms. 平时冷静的狗在雷暴期间会异常地行为。

quiz.question: ____ dismally
quiz.explanation: 阴沉地，阴沉地下雨。It would rain dismally for days without any sunshine. 天会阴沉地下雨好几天而没有任何阳光。

quiz.question: ___ diagonally
quiz.explanation: 对角地，对角地切。The chef would cut diagonally across the sandwich for presentation. 厨师会对角地切三明治以便摆盘。

quiz.question: ____ conversationally
quiz.explanation: 交谈地，交谈地说话。They would talk conversationally as if they had known each other for years. 他们会交谈地说话，仿佛认识多年。

quiz.question: ____ infernally
quiz.explanation: 极其地，极其地疼痛。The burn wound would hurt infernally for hours. 烧伤伤口会极其地疼痛好几个小时。

quiz.question: _______ incidentally
quiz.explanation: 顺便，顺便提到。He would mention incidentally that he had won the lottery. 他会顺便提到他中了彩票。

quiz.question: _____ mortally
quiz.explanation: 致命地，致命地受伤。The soldier was mortally wound in the battle. 士兵在战斗中致命地受伤。

quiz.question: squally _______
quiz.explanation: 狂风暴雨的，狂风暴雨的天气。The sailors faced squally weather on their voyage across the Atlantic. 水手们在横渡大西洋的航程中面临狂风暴雨的天气。

quiz.question: ___ underbelly
quiz.explanation: 下腹部，下腹部。The documentary exposed the underbelly of organized crime. 这部纪录片揭露了有组织犯罪的黑暗面。

quiz.question: gravelly _____
quiz.explanation: 沙哑的，沙哑的声音。The old blues singer had a distinctive gravelly voice. 这位老布鲁斯歌手有着独特的沙哑的声音。

quiz.question: chilly ____
quiz.explanation: 寒冷的，寒冷的风。A chilly wind blew through the autumn streets. 一阵寒冷的风吹过秋天的街道。

quiz.question: frilly _____
quiz.explanation: 镶褶边的，镶褶边的连衣裙。The little girl wore a pink frilly dress to the birthday party. 小女孩穿着粉红色镶褶边的连衣裙去参加生日派对。

quiz.question: ______ shrilly
quiz.explanation: 尖声地，尖声地尖叫。The frightened child would scream shrilly when seeing the spider. 受惊的孩子看到蜘蛛时会尖声地尖叫。

quiz.question: _____ dully
quiz.explanation: 沉闷地，沉闷地说话。The depressed man would speak dully without any emotion. 抑郁的男人会沉闷地说话，毫无情感。

quiz.question: _____ gleefully
quiz.explanation: 欢快地，欢快地笑。The children would laugh gleefully while playing in the snow. 孩子们在雪地里玩耍时会欢快地笑。

quiz.question: ____ balefully
quiz.explanation: 恶狠狠地，恶狠狠地看。The angry cat would look balefully at the person who disturbed its sleep. 愤怒的猫会恶狠狠地看着打扰它睡觉的人。

quiz.question: _____ spitefully
quiz.explanation: 恶意地，恶意地微笑。She would smile spitefully at her rival's embarrassment. 她会对对手的尴尬恶意地微笑。

quiz.question: ____ ruefully
quiz.explanation: 懊悔地，懊悔地看。He would look ruefully at his broken phone after dropping it. 他把手机摔坏后会懊悔地看着它。

quiz.question: _____ mercifully
quiz.explanation: 仁慈地，仁慈地饶恕。The king would mercifully spare the prisoner's life. 国王会仁慈地饶恕囚犯的生命。
